basics.name: Sydney Dempsey
basics.label: Student
basics.summary:
Welcome to my portfolio! I'm Sydney Dempsey, a passionate and driven Software Engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from the University of Hawaii at Manoa. During my time at the university, I served as President of the HKN Delta Omega Chapter and was honored as a Regents Scholar.

                My journey into the world of programming began in the 8th grade, and it was love at first sight when I was introduced to C. This early passion fueled my decision to pursue a career in Software Engineering. I started as a Front End Software Engineer at DataHouse Consulting, where I gained valuable experience with React and Vue.js.

highlights: Collaborated closely with the project manager and UI/UX designer on the Figma mockups to ensure alignment of technical solutions with business objectives.
Coordinated with the back-end developer to integrate the RESTful API and ensure seamless data flow between the front-end and back-end systems.
Utilized modern front-end frameworks such as React, Angular, and Vue.js to create responsive and user-friendly web-applications.

Contributed to the development and maintenance of five mobile applications built for the Hawaii Department of Education, each consisting of approximately 12 screens and 10 custom components and modals.

work.summary: Ran the instagram and facebook accounts for the admissions office. I also created the informational and promotional videos for incoming freshman
highlights: Answer questions sent in by potential students
Support events hosted by the CoE
Establish relationships among peers, fellow members, and professionals

awards.title: Regents Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen who completed a rigorous high school curriculum and demonstrated leadership qualities.

awards.title: Harriet Bouslog Scholarship
awards.summary: A renewable scholarship given to UH students who have had a family member in the ILWU.
